name: Computer Science
messageFromHod: Our department focuses on developing future tech leaders and innovators.

name: Mechanical Engineering
messageFromHod: We strive for excellence in designing, building, and testing mechanical systems.

name: Civil Engineering
messageFromHod: Our vision is to train engineers who build infrastructure that transforms societies.

name: Electrical Engineering
messageFromHod: We prepare students to lead in the development of electrical systems that power the world.

name: Chemical Engineering
messageFromHod: Our department focuses on applying chemical processes for sustainable solutions.

name: Aerospace Engineering
messageFromHod: We train students to shape the future of flight and space exploration.

name: Biotechnology
messageFromHod: We aim to integrate biology and technology to improve lives through innovative research.

name: Environmental Engineering
messageFromHod: Our department emphasizes environmental sustainability and conservation technologies.

name: Industrial Engineering
messageFromHod: We focus on improving processes and systems to optimize production and efficiency.

name: Information Technology
messageFromHod: Our department is committed to producing skilled IT professionals who drive digital transformation.

name: Pharmaceutical Engineering
messageFromHod: Our department strives to create professionals who excel in pharmaceutical technology and contribute to healthcare advancements.

name: Printing Engineering
messageFromHod: The Printing Engineering department focuses on preparing students to be leaders in the field of printing technology, innovation, and production.
